rukus.text: 12|1|aliph, laam, ra. ye khulee pustak kee aayaten hain.
12|2|hamane is quraan ko arabee mein utaara hai, taaki tum samajho[1].
12|3|(he nabee!) ham bahut achchhee shailee mein aapakee or is quraan kee vahî€¼yee dvaara aapase is katha ka varnan kar rahe hain. anyatha aap (bhee) isase poorv (isase) asoochit the.
12|4|jab yoosuf ne apane pita se kahaah he mere pita! mainne svapn dekha hai ki gyaarah sitaare, soory tatha chaand mujhe sajda kar rahe hain.
12|5|usane kahaah he mere putr! apana svapn apane bhaeeyon ko na bataana[1], anyatha ve tere virudhd shadyantr rachenge. vaastav mein, shaitaan maanav ka khula shatru hai.

12|6|aur aisa hee hoga, tera paalanahaar tujhe chun lega tatha tujhe baaton ka arth sikhaayega aur tujhapar aur yaaqoob ke gharaane par apana puraskaar poora karega[1]. jaise isase pahale tere poorvajon ibraaheem aur ishî€¼aaq par poora kiya. vaastav mein, tera paalanahaar bada gyaanee tatha gunee hai.
